detectors.description:
TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#170-186) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_to] + _value > balanceOf[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#176)
	- previousBalances = balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#178)
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#185)

[TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#L170-L186) may have integer overflow

	- [previousBalances = balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#L178)

detectors.description:
ERC20ext._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#307-317) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)((block.timestamp > lockedAccount[_from]) || lockedAmount[_from] + _value < balanceOf[_from]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#308)
	- require(bool)(balanceOf[_to] + _value >= balanceOf[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20ext.sol#311)
